 We#BePartOfSomethingSpecial

Join our team

A career at the Pandimensional Trading Company will open doors for you, join us on our journey.

We’re always on the look out for top talent to join us. Here’s some of our open vacancies. Don’t see anything right for you? No problem, tell us about your skills and experience and when something comes up we’ll get in touch.

 

Discord Moderator/Community Managers
Multiple part-time and full-time roles available across all time zones

Key Responsibilities 

  • Help us keep our community safe on Discord
  • Address onboarding questions 
  • Signal-boost relevant news and engage the community 
  • Monitor and moderate content according to community rules 
  • Feedback to the team and collaborate with stakeholders on projects
  • Maintain a professional and upbeat attitude 

Skills and Qualifications 

  • Strong written English, fluency in an additional language is a plus but not essential 
  • Comfortable with self-management 
  • Must have strong familiarity with NFTs and NFT trends 
  • Previous moderation/management experience preferred but not required (training provided)
  • Familiarity with art is preferred but not required
  • Open-minded thinking and willingness to learn

Click here to apply

 

Web 2.0 Front-end Devs and Web3 Developers
Multiple contract roles available
£DOE

  • Experience in web3, React.js, TypeScript, and other modern web development technologies
  • Expertise with Solidity
  • Ability to build modern, event-driven React frontends, converting Figma designs into functional components
  • Knowledge of Ethereum and web3 development frameworks like Web3.js or Ethers.js
  • Software development background (3+ years of experience)
  • Experience working with open-source projects
  • Strong knowledge of common algorithms and data structures
  • Familiarity with modern software architecture techniques for building modular and testable applications

Click here to apply

 

Artist/Illustrator
Permanent and/or contract roles available
£DOE + benefits + equity

  • 2D illustration
  • 2D animation
  • Adobe Creative Suite
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Illustrator

Click here to apply

 

What’s it like working at PTCo?

We’re a highly motivated and passionate team. Creativity, innovation and Cherryade courses through our veins. We often work long hours, we always challenge ourselves, and we don’t settle for less than perfect.

We know that dedication like this deserves significant benefits. That’s why every member of our team is given a stake in the business, a great salary, bonus scheme, pension contributions, perks such as health insurance, opportunities for training and remote working. We have offices in London and Nantes, France, and we accept applications from anyone in timezones +/- 6 hours of GMT.

Be part of something special

Our motto, “Be part of something special”, is definitely not our attempt to assimilate your consciousness into an evil hive mind, or use your organs to construct highly efficient AI cyborgs. No. Definitely not. Please ignore the rumours.

When we invite you to #BePartofSomethingSpecial it’s because we’ve built something that can change people’s lives and we want to work with people that have the same values as us.

Thank you for considering joining the PTCo. team.

Your friend,
PJ Cooper
Co-founder and CEO
